name: Just Move ! (Workout)
description:
You need to move !

But don't know what exercise to do ? Let this game guide you and start moving !

This game / app gives you the ability to concentrate on the exercises and let the game decide which one to do. No more "I don't know what to do", !

Current exercises available :

More of them are on the way.

  1.  Push-ups
  2. Decline push-ups
  3. Incline push-ups
  4. Abs
  5. Dips
  6. Leg raises
  7. Lunges
  8. Plank
  9. Plank + leg raises
  10. Side plank
  11. Side plank + leg raises
  12. Squats
  13. Calf raises
  14. Quadruped arm + leg raises
  15. Jumping jacks
  16. Knee tuck jump
  17. Flutter kicks
  18. Wall squat

If your favorite workout exercise is not in this list, feel free to suggest it in the comments.

Material needed :

This game is intended to be played at home with very limited material. It takes nothing more than a few pieces of furniture to lean on for some exercises.

Note :

I am not in any way a sports expert, if any exercise is dangerous or badly explained please comment it so I can address the issue.

If you don't know/understand the exercise, please do your own research.

Please don't hurt yourself doing something you are not capable of or doing an exercise you are not familiar with. Known issues :
  • If the phone is in silent mode, sounds cannot be heard.
